thread.title: Call drops in Delhi to reduce in 3-4 months Vodafone
thread.title_full: Call drops in Delhi to reduce in 3-4 months Vodafone

title: Call drops in Delhi to reduce in 3-4 months Vodafone
text:
Call drops in Delhi to reduce in 3-4 months: Vodafone 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
NEW DELHI: Vodafone has said there will be significant improvement in call drop problem in Delhi within 12-16 weeks as it plans to put up more sites as well as augment capacity of the existing ones. In the last six months, Vodafone has put up over 500 sites in Delhi-NCR, while capacity of existing 550 sites have been augmented. "As an operator, my sense is that in next 12-16 weeks, you will see clear tangible difference in call drops and overall voice quality (problems)," Vodafone business head (Delhi), Apoorva Mehrotra told PTI. The company plans to set up more sites, he said but did not shar...
